name.ch: 科技英文寫作溝通與口語表達

remark.ch: 專業英文（ESP）中高級課程。 1.歡迎大二以上有修習EMI的學生選修課程 2.課程也 可以抵LN29課號，修課完成後請至語言中心辦理學分抵修。 3.第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績 4.前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to： 1. acquire technical English vocabulary and proficiently use professional terminology in technical English; 2. improve their ability to read technical documents and learn writing techniques to compose clear, concise, and understandable technical documents; 3. better understand technical documents and communicate more effectively and confidently; 4. develop better self-learning ability with relevant learning resources and tools so that students can continue to improve their technical English skills.
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能: 1. 提高對科技英文詞彙的掌握程度，並能熟練使用科技英文專業術語; 2. 提升閱讀科技文件的能力與寫作技巧以撰寫清晰、簡明易懂的技術文件; 3. 提升口語表達能力，具備以專業和自信的方式簡報科技內容資訊與研究成果; 4. 運用相關的學習資源和工具，發展自主學習能力，以繼續提高自己的科技英語能力

content.en: This course is designed to improve students' technical writing and communication skills, including written documentation and oral presentation. It covers topics such as technical writing tools, technical writing, as well as presentation skills.
content.ch: 本課程重點旨在提高學生的技術寫作和溝通能力，包括書面文獻和口頭演講。它涵蓋了技術寫作工具、科技文件寫作，以及科技英文演講與簡報技巧等主題。

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導
